Specimen Type: Sputum, bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL) fluid, tissue biopsy, blood
Purpose: To detect and identify Histoplasma capsulatum and Blastomyces species DNA in clinical specimens for timely patient management.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container (varies by specimen type; e.g., sterile screw-cap tube)
Equipment: Biosafety cabinet, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, real-time PCR instrument, spectrophotometer (optional), agarose gel electrophoresis system
